name: Revenge of Najmanito
description:
A simple game that me and my friends made for a school project. It contains 3 short levels. 

The game shows a journey of a fox named Foxy, as he comes after the evil Najmanito threatening his homeland. During his adventure he finds a crossbow that he uses to defeat his enemies. Additionally, the arrows from the crossbow can stick to the walls and can be used as platforms, that our brave hero can use to ascend to inaccessible areas.

Game is made for keyboard + mouse where keyboard controls Foxy and mouse is used to aim and shoot the crossbow.
